siteMetadata.title: vwa.la help
siteMetadata.description: Everything you need to know about the vwa.la influencer marketing platform.

markdownRemark.html:
vwa.la is an influencer marketing platform. We help you create, grow and manage your influencer team.

New users

If you're new to our platform, you will be interested in the following:

  • Customise the style and behaviour of vwa.la
  • Add a marketing page to your store. This page will introduce your customers or prospective influencers to your influencer marketing program and help them sign-up.
  • Create a test influencer account so that you can experience how a influencer will use your influencer marketing program.
  • Find and invite influencers to join your influencer marketing program

FAQ

Is referral, affiliate and influencer marketing the same thing?

Yes, that's right.

Referral/affiliate/influencer/ambassador marketing bascially mean the same thing. There are subtle differences, but they are trivial in practice. So feel free to use whichever term suits your brand the best!
